document.full_text: u.s. nuclear regulators are launching additional inspections and considering a 90-day review of the country's 104 nuclear reactors in the wake of japan's nuclear crisis, officials said on monday.
document.title: u.s. plans more nuclear inspections after japan crisis
lines_and_colors: u.s. nuclear regulators are launching additional inspections and considering a 90-day review of the country's 104 nuclear reactors in the wake of japan's nuclear crisis, officials said on monday.
